statements: DELETE FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE id = 1 AND production_data > 1000;
DELETE FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE maintenance_status = 'urgent' AND operating_hours < 500;
DELETE FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData WHERE turbine_name = 'Turbine A';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Check' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TurbinePerformance WHERE turbine_id = 3 AND efficiency < 0.8 OR temperature > 60;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE turbine_id = 3 AND task = 'Blade Inspection';
DELETE FROM TurbineSensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE turbine_id = 3 AND task LIKE '%inspection%';
DELETE FROM TurbineMetrics WHERE metric_id = 5 AND metric_value < 1000;
